title: Ultimate Game Music Loops Bundle
description: The ultimate collection of music tracks, including all 11 theme packs of horror, sci-fi, cyberpunk, rhythm and action music, containing 336 loops and tracks and almost 6 hours of music perfect for backgrounds, action and battle scenes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/ultimate-game-music-loops-bundle

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2s5nhedumk0wotn/MSE%20-%20Ultimate%20Game%20Music%20Loops%20Bundle_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The Bundle contains 11 music packs and 336 music loops.

The total size of audio samples is 3.7 Gb.

The total duration of the music is almost 6 hours.

The regular price of all products individually is $255.


The following music packs are included in the Bundle:

  1. Cyberpunk Music Loops Vol. 1
  2. Cyberpunk Music Loops Vol. 2
  3. Cyberpunk Music Loops Vol. 3
  4. Cyberpunk Music Loops Vol. 4
  5. Disturbing Music Loops
  6. Guitar - Rhythmic Music Loops
  7. Horror Game Music Loops
  8. Hybrid - Rhythmic Music Loops
  9. Piano - Rhythmic Music Loops
  10. Sci-Fi Music Loops
  11. Strings - Action Music Loops


All tracks are mixed and mastered with careful use of equalization, compression and saturation.


The wide selection of music is designed for a variety of genres and is able to solve the most daring tasks of creating the completeness of the project.


Use loops as ready-made compositions for gameplay dynamic action or battle scenes, background menus, trailer music, animations or videos.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 336 music loops
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 11 music products
  • total size of the audio samples is 3.7 Gb
  • great for action and background
  • perfect for RPG, Fighting, Adventure, Horror, Sci-Fi, Space, Shooter, and other game genres


Number of Audio Wavs: 336

Number of Audio Cues: 336

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 05 hours 52 minutes 32 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
